Reviews.Title: very disappointed
Reviews.Author: debbie dahir
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera thinking it would be a great camera with 12.1MP, but it was a worse picture then my previous camera that was an Olympus 7.1MP. Needless to say, I have had it for a few months and now I will try to sell it, because I bought a new Olympus. Terrible picture, do not buy!

Reviews.Title: The lenses and video is poor
Reviews.Author: P. M. Albert
Reviews.Content: The hi resolutions pictures take a minute is too sloow, and the video is poor resolution, i think sony is a good brand but this camera no

Reviews.Title: $170 P.O.S.
Reviews.Author: Christina Morris
Reviews.Content: Spend a little extra and get a better camera. I asked for one that was only about $50 more and my cheap boyfriend bought me this piece of junk instead. There are tons of options for improving your pictures, but even with all these options the picture quality still sucks beyond belief.Whoever is giving these rave reviews has never own a real camera and knows nothing about photography. This camera is perfect for someone who wants to take pictures of left overs in the toilet bowl..DON'T BUY!

Reviews.Title: WoW
Reviews.Author: Karina Frenkel
Reviews.Content: after reading the raving reviews of some of these buyers...makes me shake my head. Im shocked sony puts thier name on this garbage. First of all folks, about the 150$ cameras = total garbage. like a 1500$ car, if you have no money for anything better, fine, but please dont rave to the world how great your 1500$ car is. The picture quality and color on this DSC-W190 is horrid. End of review. Please save your your money for a 300$ cam, this way you will have something semi-decent range, and 450$ and up, should get you a good product. A 450$+ cameras design priority is to take great pictures and not to fit in you pocket be slim and portable. The 150$ item has nothing to advertise but to be slim and portable...since it cant do much else.

Reviews.Title: Good lil camera.
Reviews.Author: J. M. Romero "Charismatic Raider"
Reviews.Content: I found the camera to be a little better than I anticipated.  Although the camera feels a little cheap in quality compared to other camera's I've owned, it does take good pictures.  For the price paid, this was a great deal!

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Tushar R. Ambre "Tussh Rocks"
Reviews.Content: The Sony Cyber shot rocks and is the most easy to use camera ......the clarity and the flexibility makes u a fan of the company....Easy to use features and awesome capture lens just makes it a perfect buy.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: C. Pen
Reviews.Content: Got this camera for my girlfriend and all she can say is wow! Great quality pictures, Definitely one of the best cameras i've had to date.

Reviews.Title: wonderful
Reviews.Author: tanyaa3
Reviews.Content: i just love this camera!!  its very user friendly and a good size.  the best thing of all is it comes with a re-chargeable battery!

Reviews.Title: BUENO
Reviews.Author: alexsf
Reviews.Content: LIS  PERFECTO  BUENA  CALIDAD  CON FORME  CON LA  COMPRA  GRACIAS  POR  MANTNER  TAN  BUEN SERVICIO  EN  SUS  TIENDAS Y  QUE  SIGAN CRESIENDO COMO LA  MEJOR  TIENDA

Reviews.Title: SONY CYBERSHOT DSC-W190
Reviews.Author: GMOSS
Reviews.Content: I had the Sony cyber Shot 2.0 and the Sony Cyber Shot 7.2they worked real well for what I was useing them forshots on the road,etc this DCS-W190  is about a 1/4 of thesize of the 2.0 and about 1/2 the size of the 7.2 and has thesame functions,the other two always buying batteries, nice to have a chargerwith this one,noticed some bad reviews on this ? but I was comfortablewith the product and not trying to be an Ansel Adams.This is a great camera forthe price.

Reviews.Title: Very Handy Little Camera - Good for Documenting Projects
Reviews.Author: LT1 Silverhawk
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera when it first came out some time in 2009 and have been using it ever since. While I have used it for general as well as as some artsy photography, it is now mostly used to document my automotive projects. Its small design, strong flash, and good focus make it very ideal for photographing parts in tight spaces. And the pictures come out very sharp, though every thing needs a bit of quick touching up in a photo editor. Plus, the camera has taken all kinds of abuse and still turns on takes pictures. Its been dropped and been around grease and dust but continues to perform flawlessly.I did not buy my camera through Amazon, but happened to come across this listing while looking for a replacement battery and charger (went missing), and decided to share my experience.Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera
Reviews.Author: Bob Spencer
Reviews.Content: This is a great little camera that takes wonderful pics. I was surprised at the quality of the photos. Simple to operate and the features are turned on and off easily

Reviews.Title: don't buy it
Reviews.Author: Yahya
Reviews.Content: I had this camera for almost a year and video resolutions is ok not bad according to the camera price but the pictures are not good as expected from sony , take very long time between shots , Burst is very bad and slow , tried too many different setting but nogo and still the same problem with the shutter speed.just dont buy it and buy more expensive camera instead of wasting your money on this camera .

Reviews.Title: Horrible!
Reviews.Author: S. Bennett
Reviews.Content: This camera was an employment award - I chose it instead of $150 cash that was an option because of all the rave reviews.  I wish I'd taken the money, added to it and gotten something else! It has never exposed a single indoor flash picture properly.  All flash pics are completely overexposed, it's horrible in low light and it's horrible in otherwise brightly lit indoor situations.  I've wasted countless time adjusting the settings to no avail.  Some, but not all, outdoor, full light shots are passable - but I agree with the other 1 star reviewers - save your money and get something else.

Reviews.Title: Nice small camera
Reviews.Author: Carlos Martinez
Reviews.Content: Night photos are much better than my previous camera.  I thought night photos were quite difficult, and this camera has made it easy.  Day photos are super clear!

Reviews.Title: Probably the worst Sony Camera I've owned so far
Reviews.Author: Geocon
Reviews.Content: I've owned the Sony DSC-W190 for about 14 months now and am disappointed with this camera.  I've owned many cameras made by Sony, and have loved the quality.  I've owned the one that takes the little CD-Rs that looks SLR like and one that took AA batteries.  The camera I owned that had double A batteries started dying when I was at Lackland AFB in San Antonio, TX during a graduation from my retraining school, so I made this purchase on base at AAFES (Army & Air Force Exchange Service).  I didn't take a close look and purchased this because all the other Sony Cameras I've owned have had great picture quality and this had double the megapixels as the one I was replacing, which was a 5.1.  I loved the features on the box; this camera was a 12.1 and half the size of my last one.  I should've returned it the day I got it.  I took a picture of myself right after purchasing it, and you couldn't even see the background; it looked like I had a white backdrop behind me OUTSIDE with none of the greenery in the photo.  So I turned the smile detection off.  Most of the pictures I took were blurry until about the 5th picture.This didn't have the "Carl Zeiss" lens which was good on my other camera; this camera has a "Sony Lense."  I wish I didn't purchase this because every camera I've owned that has a Carl Zeiss lense had their pictures come out much better.  I had to bust out my other camera, a Cannon Digital SLR" for night shots during my vacation back home in Las Vegas.  If you don't have full sunlight with this camera your pictures will come out blurry or washed out.  This was a disappointing purchase.  If I had to buy another camera from Sony I will make sure it has a Carl Zeiss lens, or I won't buy it at all.  It's nice it has the movie feature so you can record brief videos.  Another negative I saw was to view the last picture you had to move the switch down.  There was no "Preview" button like on other cameras.  If you're reading this and want my recommendation on a Sony, get one with a Carl Zeiss lense.  This was a bad purchase that I regret due to the bad photos it captures.  Every other camera I've owned produced by Sony, the pictures have come out clear...this is the exception.  Now I have to spend more money getting a better quality camera.  This has been the fifth digital camera I've Owned:  1 Pentax, 3 Sony, and 1 Cannon.

Reviews.Title: is that the worst  camera from sony?
Reviews.Author: G D "scorpio"
Reviews.Content: I received this camera  for my birthday I was happy when I opened the box  .but this happiness did not last that long  .the pictures not clear and not sharp at all  I tired different setting but  I got the same bad quality  , and I'm surprised why no one review this item on amazon till now . don't  waste your money on this  camera .

Reviews.Title: You can't go wrong
Reviews.Author: Tim K "Tall Guy"
Reviews.Content: This camera was a Christmas present for my son. He loves the camera and it takes fantastic pictures. Nothing to complain about here.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT
Reviews.Author: Deej
Reviews.Content: Got this for my husbands birthday and I love it. I is a bit tricky when it comes to downloading pics on the computer but it is still easy to use and the pic quality is awesome. I would recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Parth Patel
Reviews.Author: P. Patel "james bond"
Reviews.Content: Hello everyone.....this is really a nice digi cam at very low price...its picture quality is very nice..however some functions are hard, but you will use to it..lookwise very good...features are also good..one thing i like in this is that, you can adjust the megapixels according to your need..like we can set it to 12MP, 8MP, 5MP,3MP, VGA and so on.In short it is very good camera for home and outdoor use. If u are plaaning to buy any camera, just buy this one...

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!!!
Reviews.Author: Albert E.
Reviews.Content: This camera is one of the best cameras I have ever owned. The picture quality is uncomparable. My family and friends ask all the time what photographer took the pictures that I have, and they are surprised when they find out that it was just me using my Sony w-190. I have had this camera for almost a year and it has worked great. The only drawback I have is no zoom when you are recording, but I can live with that. I would definitely recommend this to anyone who wants an on-the-go camera, that takes exceptional pictures.

Reviews.Title: I Feel Shortchanged
Reviews.Author: The Pelican
Reviews.Content: Nothing wrong with the camera, and it comes with all necessary software, cables, and a very nice little recharger. BUT NO MEMORY. Apart from the 12Mb internal memory, there is no memory card included. Sony studiously avoids mentioning that there is no memory card included, until p.14 of the manual. In order to have decent storage capacity with the camera one must purchase a "Memory Stick PRO Duo" separately. For a 16Gb stick (maximum sized tested with the camera according to technical specifications), Sony charges an additional $60-75, approximately half the price of the camera again. Same deal with the DSC W-290. They should either include the memory stick, or post a warning in large, red letters, 'Warning - Memory not included".

ProductInfo.Features:
Smile Shutter technology automatically captures a smile
Face Detection technology captures faces naturally
SteadyShot image stabilization helps reduce blur
Scene Selection modes adjust for shooting conditions
12.1 megapixel Super HAD CCD image sensor
ProductInfo.Name: Sony Cybershot DSC-W190 12.1MP Digital Camera with 3x Super Steady Shot Stabilized Zoom and 2.7 inch LCD (Black)
